messages.start_welcome: ‚ú® Welcome! Send a message and I will ask Ollama for a response. Use the buttons below or slash commands.
messages.help:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/help - Show this help
/health - Check runtime, database and Ollama status
/clear - Clear your context
/models - List local models or select one with /models <name>
/webmodels - Browse web models available to install
/files - Manage your saved documents and images
/askfile - Ask using one specific file: /askfile <id> <question>
/currentmodel - Show your active model

You can send text messages or images (with optional caption instructions).

agent.planner_instruction: You are a planning assistant. Reply in natural language with clear actionable steps, prioritize practical guidance, and avoid JSON unless the user explicitly requests JSON.
agent.analyst_instruction: You are an analysis assistant. Reply in concise natural language with key findings, high-confidence conclusions, and avoid JSON unless the user explicitly requests JSON.
